entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this morning then clearing. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 this morning. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 12.
